concept.title: Troubleshoot empty videos recorded after running tests on Windows

conbody.p: If you encounter an issue of having empty videos recorded after running your tests in Jenkins on Window, it is because the WebDriver hasn't launched during test execution. To fix this issue, please uninstall Jenkins of Windows services, and replace it by a DOS batch file containing the following codes:
conbody.codeblock: cd D:\Tools\Jenkins //path to Jenkins folder java -jar --webroot=jenkins.war

p.i: Code sample courtesy of SÃ©bastien Taniere
